tika-vin11t9:1_0: 1964. Evaṁ bhikkhuvibhaṅgapāḷiyā, aṭṭhakathāya ca āgataṁ vinicchayasāraṁ nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena
tika-vin11t9:1_1: dassetvā idāni tadanantarāya bhikkhunivibhaṅgapāḷiyā, tadaṭṭhakathāya ca āgatavinicchayasāraṁ
tika-vin11t9:1_2: dassetumārabhanto āha “bhikkhunīna”ntiādi. Tasmiṁ apīti ettha api-saddo vuttāpekkhāyaṁ.
tika-vin11t9:1_3: “Samāsenā”ti idaṁ ganthavasena saṅkhipanaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ. “Kiñcimatta”nti idaṁ
